title: Man Clones Best Friend: Tom Brady’s New Pup Is a Copy of the Original
contentSnippet: Colossal Bioscience has cloned former NFL star Tom Brady's dog, drawing the ire from some who are calling for a moratorium on pet cloning.

title: Jack Dorsey’s Block sees nearly $2 billion in bitcoin revenue in Q3, nearly 1/3 of its total revenues
contentSnippet: Block’s bitcoin revenue accounted for about $1.97 billion of its total revenue, down from $2.4 billion during the same quarter last year.

title: Microsoft Gave AI Agents Fake Money to Buy Things Online. They Spent It All on Scams
contentSnippet: Microsoft built a simulated economy with hundreds of AI agents acting as buyers and sellers, then watched them fail at basic tasks.

title: Your AI Trading Bot Might Have a Gambling Problem
contentSnippet: New research shows AI models can develop genuine gambling addiction, with some going broke 48% of the time—and the prompts traders use make it dramatically worse.

title: Spanish Council Aims to Sell Bitcoin After 1,000x Jump, Could Fuel Quantum Research
contentSnippet: Tenerife's Technological and Renewable Energy Institute bought 97 Bitcoin in 2012—and now wants to sell them after a 1,000x price increase.

title: Binance, Buenos Aires to Encourage Sensible Crypto Adoption—But What About Meme Coins?
contentSnippet: The Buenos Aires government and Binance are working together to get Argentinians using digital assets safely. The country's president is the subject of an ongoing criminal probe.

title: Sweepstakes Casino MyPrize Takes a Punt on Prediction Markets With Crypto.com
contentSnippet: MyPrize has inked a deal with Crypto.com to bring prediction markets to the app's self-reported 1 million global users.

title: Elixir sunsets deUSD synthetic stablecoin following Stream Finance unwinding, aims for full redemptions
contentSnippet: Elixir says it processed redemptions for 80% of deUSD holders, and has snapshotted the remaining balances for future USDC redemptions.

title: Google Brings Prediction Markets Polymarket and Kalshi to Its Search and Finance Platforms
contentSnippet: For the first time, users can access live market odds on future events directly in Google Search and Google Finance, elevating blockchain-powered forecasts into public view.

title: GTA 6 Preview: What We Know About the New Grand Theft Auto and Bitcoin Rumors
contentSnippet: UPDATE: GTA 6 has just been delayed again, and now we'll be waiting more than a year to play the next Grand Theft Auto.

title: SUI Falls Below $2.00 Support as Volume Spikes and Traders Eye Key Reversal Pattern
contentSnippet: The Layer-1 token dropped 2.5% amid a sharp rise in trading volume, with a potential rebound forming after a double-bottom.

title: Will Robinhood Start a Bitcoin Treasury? Firm Says It's Weighing 'Pros and Cons'
contentSnippet: The firm's SVP of Finance and Strategy Shiv Verma said that the company's management is "constantly" discussing the possibility of a Bitcoin treasury.

title: Myriad Moves: Traders Flip Bearish on Bitcoin, But Bullish on Zcash
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on whether Bitcoin can hit a new all-time high this year, and if Zcash can stay hot.

title: Trump Cuts Prices on Ozempic and Wegovy in Deal With GLP-1 Weight Loss Drug Makers
contentSnippet: President Trump's plan drops the price of Ozempic and Wegovy for Americans, with plans for Medicare to cover the popular GLP-1 weight loss drugs.

title: Robot Ventures leads $5.2 million seed round for Sprinter, a ‘solving-as-a-service’ startup founded by Ethereum OGs
contentSnippet: Sprinter is a crosschain “solving-as-a-service” infrastructure startup that provides access to collateral-free credit.

title: The Daily: Google to integrate Polymarket and Kalshi data in search results, JPMorgan sees bitcoin reaching $170,000, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: ICP Jumps 34% to $7.02 in Explosive Breakout Above Key Resistance
contentSnippet: Internet Computer soars to $7.02, climbing 34% in a breakout move that confirms renewed bullish momentum backed by exceptional trading activity.

title: Samourai Wallet’s Keonne Rodriguez sentenced to maximum five-year term over crypto mixing service
contentSnippet: Samourai Wallet co-founder Keonne Rodriguez was sentenced to five years in prison and ordered to pay a quarter-million dollar fine on Thursday.

title: Stellar Faces Renewed Selling Pressure as XLM Reverses From Key Resistance
contentSnippet: Stellar (XLM) slid 2.2% amid heavy selling at the $0.2815 resistance level, confirming continued bearish momentum as volume spiked.

title: Google Finance to roll out Polymarket and Kalshi prediction markets data in search results
contentSnippet: Google said prediction markets data from leading platforms Polymarket and Kalshi will roll out over the coming weeks.

title: HBAR Slips 2.6% to $0.1691 as Support Test Draws Heavy Volume
contentSnippet: Hedera’s native token rebounds after a sharp 2.6% drop, with rising volume and a confirmed double-bottom pattern signaling potential upside toward $0.1730.

title: Robinhood cautious on adopting corporate bitcoin treasury: ‘Is it the best use of our capital?’
contentSnippet: Robinhood’s crypto revenue rose 300% to $268 million in the third quarter, helping drive higher overall revenues of $1.27 billion.

title: Bitcoin’s Fair Value Is $170K, JPMorgan Argues in Gold-Based Model
contentSnippet: Using risk capital metrics, the bank says BTC should match two-thirds of gold's private investment base, up from $102K now.

title: Samourai Wallet Developer Sentenced to 5 Years in Prison for Unlicensed Money Transmitting
contentSnippet: District Judge Denise Cote sentenced Keonne Rodriguez to the statutory maximum. Fellow developer William Lonergan Hill will be sentenced later this month.

title: Crypto Shares Slammed, BTC Heads Back to $100K Alongside Thursday Stock Market Sell-Off
contentSnippet: Continuing a steep slide begun in July, Michael Saylor's Strategy has now turned lower on a year-over-year basis.

title: Synthetic stablecoin USDX depegs below $0.60, PancakeSwap and Lista monitoring the situation
contentSnippet: USDX, which had an all-time circulating supply of $683 million, is trading below $0.60, raising concerns of potential defaults.

title: UK Stablecoin Rules Will Be in Place 'as Quickly as the U.S.,' BOE Says: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: BOE Deputy Governor Sarah Breeden tied the need to impose caps on stablecoin holdings to the U.K.'s mortgage market, which relies on commercial bank lending.

title: BONK Slides 4% as Support Break Sparks Renewed Technical Weakness
contentSnippet: BONK declines 4.06% to $0.00001174 as failed resistance test triggers downside momentum amid rising volume.

title: Central Bank of Ireland fines Coinbase Europe $25 million for breaching anti-money laundering monitoring obligations
contentSnippet: The bank said more than 30 million transactions were not properly monitored, which led to 2,708 late suspicious transaction reports.

title: Cross-chain trading app Fomo raises $17 million in round led by Benchmark
contentSnippet: Fomo said with its app users can maintain one balance across multiple chains and don't have to worry about bridges or gas fees.
